int DepthSense::IPC::Server::updateConnections ( ConnectionListener &  listener,
bool  forcePrintInfo = false 
)

Check all the connections to see if they are still alive. If a connections is not alive anymore (i.e. the corresponding server thread is in a Finished state), the resources are deallocated. If needed, print the information. The number of connections still alive are then returned.

Parameters
[in]listenerTODO JLE
[in]forcePrintInfotrue to print connections information.
Returns
The number of connections still alive.
